Reviews.Content: I did a lot of comparing online, knowing I had to replace a crummy Canon I have.  I discovered this model and compared it to many others in the same price range and above.  I got it yesterday, and I've already taken several movies and pictures and sent one by email from the camera!  This particular model/color was $100 LESS than the same product at Walmart, and far exceeds the features of many more expensive cameras.  I am not tech-savvy at all, yet I was able to figure this one out with the easy to understand features in the menu.  It is VERY friendly to those of us that haven't caught on yet to new technology symbols.  There are editing features that you would only find in an online photo editing website.  Well worth the money, with sharp, clear pictures, and great streaming video!  If you don't mind a white camera, go for it!  Highly recommend.UPDATE 4/8/2013:  Have taken numerous pictures and a few videos with this fine camera.  I have had several past cameras in this price range (not from Amazon) that seemed like toys, in looking back.  It is a "Smart" camera that is so easy to use. This camera got knocked off a counter top to a tile floor, and nothing broke.  It still works great, like nothing happened.  Have always been impressed with Samsung products, and this just reinforces my trust in Samsung quality. Great camera at a great price!UPDATE 4/29/2013:  I become more impressed each time I use this camera. I made a movie joining various clips and viewed on HDTV.  The quality of the wide screen, HD video is professional looking.  My friend couldn't believe what he was seeing!  Absolutely amazing!  To say the least, I am thrilled with this camera.UPDATW 5/6/2013  After a 4 hour pontoon trip in beautiful Lake Jocassee, South Carolina, I and others with way more expensive cameras are absolutely flabbergasted.  There's even software in the camera to get rid of the "jiggles" during bumps in the water.  You can edit your video with on screen directions without even connecting to your computer.  ALL of the different shades of blue/green/blue-green mountains created a spectacular backdrop to the emerald water, and close ups of flowers and vegetation.  I captured all the falls, including the audio sound of he water.  The only thing I would change is the zoom, which has a small wheel that zooms too fast... other than that, this is a perfect camera... also great still pictures.  You won't regret getting one... it's $100 cheaper on Amazon than Walmart, same model!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Pleased Mom "Sheila"
Reviews.Content: Like several others, I was looking for a camera that could connect to the Internet easily. Love to post pictures as soon as I  can. I wanted to be able to zoom in better than my iPhone could.  This seemed like it was going to be perfect.  Wrong.Picture quality is poor.  Slow shutter speed. WiFi and Facebook connection slow and labor intensive. So in a nutshell, a waste of money. So disappointed.  Now I have to start my search all over again. I should have paid more attention to the 1-2 star reviews.

Reviews.Title: This is absolutely the WORST camera I have EVER owned!
Reviews.Author: S. Porcher "seannslo"
Reviews.Content: I feel bad rating this camera because it was a gift from my wife.  I laughed when I read a similar review though about that hard to shop for husband/wife thinking this is the perfect gift.  I was excited to receive it and even though the same:  this is the perfect gift.  Now I can take better pictures than just the iPhone and have some higher quality photos for the future.  It is easy to setup and use.  No problem there!  The big problem is - like many reviewers have stated - is that the pictures are HORRIBLE.  No matter what I do - and I have tried this camera now for six months - all the pictures come out blurry!  Zoom, no zoom.  Flash, no flash.  Still, action - all of them BLURRY BLURRY BLURRY.I am almost 40 - I have owned many point and shoot cameras and two very nice Cannon Eos cameras.  This is the worst out of the lot.  To be honest - the picture quality on the iPhone 5 is superior to this camera.I am so disappointed.  More so - I feel bad that I hate a gift my wife got me!!!

Reviews.Title: Failed in Six Weeks
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera on April 5, 2013. Performance degraded soon after purchase. Battery life was poor from the beginning and continued to decrease and by the sixth week, it would only take about 10 pictures after a 24 hour charge. I followed all initial charging instructions correctly.Support was a joke. Tried a chat but all they could do is refer me to a Service Request web page which had broken links and popup windows with no links at all. Threatened to charge me $55 if I didn't follow the troubleshooting pages but the troubleshooting pages did not work.Don't know if this is a battery problem or if the camera is shorted and running the battery down quickly. Should have stayed with a company that specializes in cameras such as Nikon or Olympus. For the short time it was working, it did take good pictures therefore I didn't give it a zero star rating.July 19, 2013 Update. Finally got my camera back from support and it is working OK now. Beware of Samsung support. The first person who told me to send in my camera in for repair sent me an e-mail with instructions which included an address in NJ. I FedEx the camera to them but 10 days later, Samsung sent me an e-mail saying they did  not receive the camera. I checked with FedEx and they said the package was on its way back to me. I got the package back and immediately checked the address on the package with the e-mail. Exactly the same. Called Samsung and the support tech said he would e-mail me a UPS shipping label for free shipping to the repair shop. I received the e-mail, (different address this time) repackaged the camera and sent it to the repair shop. I got the camera back in about two weeks. Not a good experience. I still don't understand how A company of Samsung's footprint could have support operations that send out the wrong repair shop address.

Reviews.Title: Great feature set, good value, WiFi, only average image quality
Reviews.Author: Bron "Bron"
Reviews.Content: 2013-02-16 Numerous updates and edits made below.I will come back and update this review with more details as I have more time with the camera, but first impressions are good for the price paid (~130).  It is of plasticky construction, but solid and the build quality seems good.  No printed manual, but the manual (PDF) is on the CD and is quite detailed.  You can read on your PC. Tablet, or other device or print it out if you like.The big question for many seems to be the WiFi.  I have a pretty standard wifi setup and I had no problems at all.  I selected my network, chose the shared setting, entered the password (easy) and it connected right away.  No need to even read the manual, just turn the dial to WiFi and you can probably figure it out if you have set up many devices before.  Once this was done, I was able to easily upload images to my SkyDrive after entering my login info, again easy to do.  I was also able to email photos to my email account.  Transfers were quick (normal wifi transfer speeds) for the 4-6 images I tested with.  If you try to transfer 500 images it's going to take awhile, probably better to just remove the SD card and use your SD card reader (or plug the camera up via USB).  But for casual transfers of images it works fine.  So the Wifi was easy to setup and use in my opinion and works well.  USB->PC transfers were also easy and fast.  And, of course, you can pop out the SD card and use your PC card reader or external USB reader as well.Update: Also tested PC Autobackup via wifi which transfers all pictures from your camera to your PC.  This is the most efficient wifi mode and also preserves the image size and quality.  Many of the other modes (like SkyDrive, social media choices, compress the file size).  You have to install the software on your PC from the CD (which also contains the manual and Intelli-Studio software) and pair once via USB.  After that you can use the PC Autobackup option from the WiFi menu on the camera and everything works automatically and efficiently. You can also transfer pictures selectively while browsing via the playback menu.  In general, all of the wifi options I have tried have worked well.  There was one instance where a transfer "stalled" but when restarted it completed fine and there were no further issues.Update: In further use AutoBackup has worked fast and without any problems.  It is definitely the best mode for saving your images off the camera via Wifi.  You always have the option of using the USB connection or removing the card, but AutoBackup works well enough that I don't see any need for that unless some circumstances preclude it. This mode tracks what you have transferred and will only transfer new images/videos - nice!  Transfers are placed in a dated folder, also nice.The camera handles well.  The Menus and controls are OK and easy to use.  Full manual settings are available which is nice at this price point. SMART mode seems to work OK. Everything works pretty much like you'd expect.  Zoom toggle is a bit small, but it worked OK.PQ Update: Images look soft and a bit low contrast.  Picture quality seems about average for a P&S; travel zoom camera.  Colors are good, saturation on the lower end compared to many.  The biggest issue seems to be the aggressive noise reduction (due to the small sensor size) which smears details and causes a loss of sharpness. Contrast also seems low.  The end result is the pictures do not have the "zing" that most out of camera jpegs have these days, so many will be disappointed in the image quality, I think.  It is possible to add some color saturation, sharpness and contrast, but the loss of detail due to the small, budget sensor cannot be "fixed." That said, apparent image quality when viewing at normal screen and print sizes is OK and this may not be a big issue for some people.  This is not a DSLR.  At this price, the quality is acceptable, and images can be tweaked in any decent editor (though the lost detail cannot be recovered). For casual use, I think it is OK.  I've seen other cameras in this price range with very similar issues.  The noise reduction smearing of small detail is the biggest negative, so if you like crisp details, this will not be a good choice for you.So, picture quality is acceptable, but not stellar.  With a bit of care, good images are possible and the wifi and other features are unique at this price level. Decide if you can live with that in exchange for the other fun features offered.  In casual use, most people are not going to notice a lot of this.  Enthusiasts will.The many various modes, scenes, and effects are all a fun plus.  The "live panorama" mode worked very well in my few tests so far.  I was quite impressed, actually.  I found the camera fun to use.  There is built in help that explains most of the choices on screen and the controls are well thought out (for the most part) and easy to figure out and use.So far, it looks like a decent deal at the current price.  Comes with battery, charger, USB cable, CD, and wrist strap, but no SD card.2013-02-16 Update: Video -  Surprise!  The relative quality of the videos are pretty good.  The 30fps 720p HD (1260x720) video tests I took looked pretty good.  Good color, saturation, contrast, and detail (for video) and all in all very acceptable.  The videos also transferred fine via AutoBackup over wifi, thought they take longer due to much larger file sizes.  Having an 18x optical zoom that works in video mode is a nice plus, too, and it works pretty well.  The video is as good or better than a lot of the small portable video cams I have used and they're in the mp4 format so almost all devices should be able to handle them well.  Sound is mono (as usual for low price cam video) but decent. So we have a bit of a "sleeper" here if you like to shoot video as well as stills.

Reviews.Title: images qualitiy is very poor
Reviews.Author: Temur
Reviews.Content: I bought it two month ago, i thought it's, and wi-fi.allshare, and I love samsung products, But picture quality was as in 5mp camera! Is too poor!! Don't spend ur money on it. There is a lot of good cameras for this price!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Dianne
Reviews.Content: Love ItI have had this for two weeks now. This camera is very user friendly. If you are not sure of a shooting mode the "smart" mode does a great job. I love the zoom for a pocket camera. The transfer wireless does a great job and I don't have the best Internet service, even tho I only do one picture at a time. I do wish it was touch screen when you type,and also have an address book to save email addresses, which is reason for 4 stars. The manual that comes with it isn't the best, but if you google the manual you can download and print it, which is about 160 pages and really goes in detail of the things this camera is capable of doing. Takes vivid and clear pictures. I haven't printed any yet, but on my computer and Facebook ,they look pretty awesome. I don't know how long the battery lasts because when I'm done using it I put it back on charge. I really recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jim L
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  Simple to use but yet packed with features.  Good quality pictures.  Much easier to use than many cameras that I looked at.  Best feature--my wife is can use it without my help.

Reviews.Title: There's good and bad.
Reviews.Author: CelticBrewer
Reviews.Content: Some qualifications first. I have a DSLR. I shoot mainly with my samsung smartphone. I've photographed a wedding and (officially) at pro sports events for a client. I've been taking pictures all of my life.  This is just meant to say- I have somewhat of a clue what I'm doing.Why I bought this: I didn't want to take my expensive and bulky DSLR setup out of the country of vacation. It's not the best of locations and the activities I was participating in couldn't accommodate the equipment. I needed a small point and shoot with decent zoom. I also considered it a huge bonus that it had wifi so I could share photos while on vacation from my hotel. It was a bonus that this, and my phone, are the same manufacturer and I could use Samsungs various apps to interface back and forth- either as a remote viewfinder and to transfer pictures back and forth.The Verdict: The wifi features are great. I connected, more often, between my phone and camera than directly from the camera to wifi. Many hotels require you to do a web-based logon when accessing their wifi. This is impossible for the camera to do.There's some scene modes that most cameras have. I mainly used the panoramic function which worked amazingly.Picture quality was variable. I believe the autofocus was lacking, especially in low light and in motion.  There is a surprisingly short depth of field if the camera is in anything but landscape mode, it seemed. And with the sketchy autofocus, I lost a more than a few shots where the wrong item was focused on.Let's talk about the zoom. This has a pretty extensive one for a camera of its size, afterall.  Well, that's why this product gets 2 stars instead of 4. After only a few days of shooting, the zoom broke. I was about to take a photo, so I extended the zoom, and then... the camera wouldn't take a picture. It wouldn't focus at all (something that happened a few times before). Like the other times, I pressed the power button to reset the camera. But this time, the lens didn't retract. On powering it up, a message said the zoom function had an error and to remove the battery and try again. I did that multiple times with no better result. The same message and only that message. Bricked.Luckily my photos were safe on the card. I used my phone's camera the rest of the trip. And Amazon refunded my purchase without issue. I wouldn't recommend this camera to anyone unless you specifically needed the specific wifi features that it has.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Samsung WB150F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Black (ECWB150FBPBUS)< this camera is not what I really intended to order. but so far it is working great.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Lor "lo-lo"
Reviews.Content: Doesn't take great pictures inside at all.  I'm definitely not a camera expert but I can't get this thing to take good pictures.  I don't know but the flash just seems weak or something its always flashing at me and won't take the picture and when it does its horrible.  I should have stuck with the Canon brand they always take great pictures. I guess the good looking exterior of this camera is what drew me to it and now I'm unhappy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: steven r tremaine
Reviews.Content: I'm a home inspector and take a lot of pictures, The quality of the pictures is great. The 18x zoom really comes in handy...I have had it about a month so far and love it.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy If You Have A High End Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Jorge's Amazons
Reviews.Content: If you have a Samsung Galaxy S3 or above, you really don't need this product.  Your smartphone will take better pictures with more pixel resolution and you will have all the feature that this camera has already built into the phone.  In regards to quality, the camera is so-so...  For the same price or a little more there are better cameras out there.

Reviews.Title: smart camera
Reviews.Author: Priscila Diaz "PRI18"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera for a cousin, she know about cameras , and she really liked it, it's basic but really really good.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Sheila Hammond
Reviews.Content: several of my friend already have this camera, so I knew it was awesome, , the price was right so I bought one for our job site.

Reviews.Title: Lens system failure (retraction?) after a few hours from new
Reviews.Author: John Klosterman
Reviews.Content: Only lasted for the first half of my daughters soccer game after receiving it brand new.  Major headache.  Lens system failed in the open position and it gives you a suggestion to remove battery and replace that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Dave in the dirt
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert, but this camera has way more features than I expected. I just use the "shoot" function  and get great photo. Battery stays charged and the wi fi feature is handy. The one I bought was reconditioned but it seemed to be brand new

Reviews.Title: Sharp!
Reviews.Author: J. Logue
Reviews.Content: I'm getting sharp photos from this little camera.  It's especially nice for macro photos of flowers and insects.  It's easy to carry along everywhere. I enjoy using it.

Reviews.Title: Such a great camera
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: This is definitely one of the best cameras out there. I love how it works with my Samsung phone. Would recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Minor but significant complaint
Reviews.Author: James kelley
Reviews.Content: Picture quality and functions were good but really annoyingly, the camera doesn't recognise when photos are taken in portrait and displays them landscape. You can manually rotate them in the edit suite but this was enough of an issue that I returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: I very nice
Reviews.Author: Olyery B.
Reviews.Content: It's a super good camera, it meets my expetativas, excellent image quality and zoom has good range also has the facility of a video shows more photos

Reviews.Title: its good
Reviews.Author: cute!
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend loves it! The flash is really bright, which i don't like... but at least she likes it lol. Image is pretty good. Must have steady hands to take good pics. Zoom works welll but image is bad.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Eloisa
Reviews.Content: For the price it's worth it. Great quality  pictures and you can download from your cAmera to Facebook.My daughter loved it!

Reviews.Title: Does everything very well.
Reviews.Author: Paul Olson
Reviews.Content: This is my second one of these.  One of the grandkids got their  hands on the first one and broke it.  My wife liked it so well that when I wanted to buy a more expensive camera she wouldn't hear of it. She wanted this exact same one.

Reviews.Title: Boom Boom
Reviews.Author: Dru
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my wife for xmas. Camera takes really good pics and we love that you can send them to your phone via the Samsung like app to our Samsung Galaxy S4's. Only downfall is it can run a little slow after taking photos sometimes.  All in all isa very good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Constance Nadig
Reviews.Content: Takes very nice quality photos.  Like to have a camera handy when the grandkids are around and this fits in my pocket easily.  Downloading photos to the computer is really easy with the cord.

Reviews.Title: My mom can use it
Reviews.Author: Brandon Wood
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for my mom (~50 yrs). The Wifi features and Facebook uploading work well when connected, but it is a bit of a hassle to get connected to Wifi. The memory of hotspots is hard to navigate and most times you need to re-enter the password whenever changing networks. Make sure to configure the Wifi connection if you ill be transmitting pictures from somewhere new.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah Langley
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera that could capture great zoomed shots from the stands to midfield for my daughters lacrosse games. This one totally does the job without having to lug around a huge Camera with massive lenses. Some of the pics will occasionally blur but I've just made a habit off taking many at the same time and then pick and chose through them later. I wish you could email more than 9 at a time though that gets annoying. And while the video quality seems good I have yet to transfer them anywhere because I get the message that the files are too large.

Reviews.Title: Great camera...but Lens stopped working
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a concert I went to, I was able to use it for about 6 mths then the lens just stopped working. The customer service was great and I recieved a full credit, I also had to option of buying another one like it.

Reviews.Title: Great eBay camera
Reviews.Author: Anne Zarraonandia "i love barbra catalog"
Reviews.Content: I needed a good quality camera for taking pics in my eBay biz/office.It's a shared camera, so it has to be easy and take great pics.Both of those criteria were met. I may buy another to have multiplecameras available.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: D Yurges
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning to use all the features but so far so good.  I would have liked to had an owners manuel instead of going to my computer and running the disk.

Reviews.Title: Really amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: JLLE21
Reviews.Content: compact size, bright display, oustanding pictures, and amazing optical zoom! i'm very pleased by this product! i'm just waiting to give it an software update and discovers what new features come with it!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: MI.Girl
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and all of it's features. It's been great for me around town and during special events. Small enough to carry everywhere, but a powerful enough camera to get better shots than the standard point and shoot. Only 4 stars because the non touchscreen can get annoying for entering passwords and captions when using the Wi-Fi feature.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Ingham
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my son, who lives out of the country and takes a lot of pictures.  Very good camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB150F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Black (ECWB150FBPBUS) from amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Trisetio Wahyuaji
Reviews.Content: I Was received these Camera  a weeks Ago ..I Felt Satisfied About The Package and Box .And Also The Camera is Helpful For Me  Because It Has Smart Auto capture which means Its getting Me Easier to take some photos Quickly.  Thanks So Much Amazon.Com

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: S. Laurence "Rockportshirl"
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to carry in my purse because I don't carry my big camera with me everywhere.  This one takes very sharp pics and it's very easy to use.  Had an older Samsung that was a great camera as well, but this one has such a great optical zoom for a small point and click-great for those "wish I had my camera with me" moments.

Reviews.Title: Nice pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Yuval
Reviews.Content: The camera is working very well and the photos are very good for such typeit is easy to hold and handle and hardly get bad photoThe only points why I gave it 4 starts instead of 5 is its WIFI abilityit has WIFI ability but it is rather complicated to use cand also send photos at low qualityall the rest is more than OK

Reviews.Title: great camera with so many features
Reviews.Author: C. Church "PRO SKATER"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a fantastic bang for the buck. You get so many useful features and a long zoom that works great. My only recommendation is to put it in the p setting and adjust the settings to achieve great pictures. Overall some of the great features and for the low price seem to make this camera a great choice. It even has a German made lens.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB150F works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Frances Tungate
Reviews.Content: This camera is smart, light, and works like a charm.  Easy set up and use.  Connectivity to internet thru wi-fi, makes it a 100% winner for me.  Exactly what I wanted, at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Caleb Castine
Reviews.Content: Very good photo quality.  Turn on speed is excellent.  Takes my 32gb XDSD card without a problem.  Optical zoom is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: J. C. "scoot"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to like this camera, I really did. But I don't. It feels cheaply made, its much to hard to navigate through its various menus and menu options and selections and settings. I find this camera tries way to hard to duplicate free photo editing apps I already have in my phone. If I didn't, I guess id appreciate this camera more (to bad its not as easy to use as smartphone apps.) Someone should remind Samsung this is a point and shoot camera not a turn on wait - turn top dial, wait - scroll - press ok - wait for menu screen to disappear - shoot. Does fit in a pocket nicely, nice (but slow) zoom. Picture quality is ehh. This is now my - ' Would not recommend. Sorry I bought this. Should have returned when I had a chance.' camera. Oh well, shame on me.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Bortz
Reviews.Content: One of the easiest to use cameras I have owned. Love the wifi feature. Pictures are crisp and clean even at night and the zoom works great.

Reviews.Title: Super & affordable Camera
Reviews.Author: nobodyveryspecial
Reviews.Content: While on vacation with my Brother & his wife he showed us his new camera and all it could do.  They have been doing Photography for years, typically using the big lenses and winning contests for their photos.... So I knew if he said it was good, it was good.  A week after we got home I ordered myself one.  Showed  my daughter-in-law and she ordered one! This camera is FUN!  You can take a picture, and is seconds put it on FB, or email it.  It was affordable & had free shipping.  Great quality photos!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Mainiero "Library Director/Consultant"
Reviews.Content: Price was good.  Pictures are good.  Like the zoom and the chance to crop out without degrading of a picture.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS LITTLE GUY! Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Jo J. Brown "Nanajo"
Reviews.Content: I use it to catch my pets or outside critters doing crazy things. Absolutely love it! Use it every day!

Reviews.Title: Muy buena
Reviews.Author: juan jaider reales
Reviews.Content: The camera is very good. The pictures that i have taken are simply awesome. Good price. Everything was perfect. J

Reviews.Title: A Speck
Reviews.Author: Cable Free Since 2003
Reviews.Content: Took a while to figure out, but apparently there is a speck between the lenses which shows up as a blurry dot in the same place on every image.  Also I thought I was buying a fancier model, but that's my fault.  It does have a nice wide angle.Update - also doesn't have a setting for low resolution pics like 640 x 480 which I needed, but didn't think to look for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: James Neglia
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have every purchased. I love the wifi capabilities it offers. On vacation, just click and load directly to your email or facebook! Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Pictures arnt the best
Reviews.Author: Austin Plummer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my fiance for Christmas and honestly the pictures are not great. My phone takes much better pictures!

Reviews.Title: Zoom Clarity is missing the mark
Reviews.Author: Skoobdo
Reviews.Content: First off, I have nothing negative to say about any of the functions, or special features as they work exceptionally good. However, the photo clarity in ANY zoomed in shot is surely lacking.I purchased this camera to take to Europe, which is where I'm using right now. Every zoomed in shot is blurry. I own a 14x zoom Canon that takes clear zoomed in shots with no issues, but it doesn't have WiFi capabilities, which is the primary reason I purchased this camera.I can also say that I haven't had any issues with regular shots, but unfortunately the zoomed in ones are not as crisp, or more blurry than others.If Samsung could improve the quality of the images taken at the zoom level, I would certainly buy it, as all the features this camera has is very nice!I can't rate this camera above 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: Stepping Higher
Reviews.Content: I would agree that this is not your typical point and shoot camera, there are some things you have to take into consideration, but for the most part it is fairly easy to navigate. I love everything about this camera. I am still trying to figure out how to take better pictures in low light, but I'm sure it's just matter of practice and reading the manual. I purchased it for a Hawaiian vacation and it lived up to my expectations. The zoom and battery life are amazing. I purchased the car charger which came with 2 additional batteries, always having a freshly charged battery helped me not miss that perfect shot. Using the wifi to email or upload pics was tedious, but there is an app you can download to your smart phone and upload the pics to your phone, that made it a lot easier to share the pictures. I am in love with the split shot and live panoramic features.

Reviews.Title: Great value for modest  cost
Reviews.Author: Gary Gores "Mr golf daily"
Reviews.Content: I use the P mode to get better pictures adjusting the light--whether sunlight, fluorescent,  incandesant, shade or low light. Camera has a difficult time getting focused on 14x zoom...

Reviews.Title: Nice features for a cheap camera
Reviews.Author: OBWONdotNET
Reviews.Content: Works well, is basic and much more advanced versions are also available now for slightly more money. Still is good

Reviews.Title: Cool White
Reviews.Author: S. A. Hoy
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera model in black to my husband a year ago.  When my camera died, I asked him if he was happy with his.  He was thrilled that it has WiFi and can send directly to email or Facebook.I am also thrilled.  I paid a lot less than the original black one purchased a year ago.Looking forward to many fine pictures and videos in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good performance & Price
Reviews.Author: Engin Bulut
Reviews.Content: Nice quality photos for price & weight.High quality zoom and good performance of wireless.Happy to use and buy it so far.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with easy sharing through WiFi
Reviews.Author: Kerkar "uma_sam"
Reviews.Content: Have always bought Nikons; but gave this Samsung camera a chance since the Black Friday price was too good despite being loaded with features such a 18X zoom and, especially, a rare built in WiFi. The WiFi has been a great convenience while traveling. It allows sharing of photos via email or Facebook without having to download to a computer. The photo quality is also quite good considering the compactness and price range.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: A camera is fascinating, takes good pictures day and night, is lightweight and is the perfect gift at a low price

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Byrd
Reviews.Content: I Just love this take a photo upload right where you stand put it on facebook email got to be the best camera i have ever had thanks Samsung

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera with easy to use functions
Reviews.Author: Mano K Ponna
Reviews.Content: I would reccommend this camera because it has built in WIFI and can be remotely take pictures with other Samsung devices.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Harley Girl
Reviews.Content: What a great little camera for so little money.. Does everything I need it to do..makes great pictures and love the fact I can send them directly to Facebook

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Lots of features for a low price......  Love the smart camera in that after I take photos I can email them directly on the spot from the camera as long as I have an active internet connection or at a nearby hot spot.  The other features I like are the easy pans. Just set the pan feature and  hold down the shutter and pan your photo, release the shutter and you are done.  You can do both horizontal or vertical pans and the long lens gives great telephoto results for bringing distant objects close.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Fatland
Reviews.Content: I wanted a inexpensive camera that fits in my purse and also takes good pictures and thats what this camera offers. Not sure how the wifi works just yet cuz the owners manual is limited in the box and im not that up on all this technology. The disk that came with the camera has not worked in my computor not sure why. But if your looking for grest zoom and pic quality this camera is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera earlier this week and have been playing around with it in the indoor setting.  I really love it.  Very easy to use.  I have the Samsung Galaxy S3 Android phone so there are two apps, one for controlling the view finder with my phone and one for sending files to my phone.  It takes great pictures.  I use a website called Be Funky to edit my pictures and it works great with that, although this camera comes with a built in picture editor if you want to use that.  I don't plan to utilize the feature where you send pictures to email or facebook from the camera because I would rather transfer the files to my phone and then edit them and share them from there or from my chromebook, but it certainly is a nice feature for someone who needs that.

Reviews.Title: buen producto
Reviews.Author: Jorge Ivan Giron
Reviews.Content: excelente vendedor  el producto llego en los tiempos establecidos por el vendedor, las prestaciones de la cámara son mas de lo esperado tiene muchas funciones muy buenas totalmente recomendado.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: DS Dave "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Compact and light in weight with a fast zoom lens. The manual features for aperature and shutter priority are useful. I have not tried the auto smile detect feature. I was  disappointed the the remote feature using a phone or tablet only works via a wifi network so you cannot use it while outside for nature shots of long exposures which is what I had hoped. It would have been better if it acted as a wifi hub and connected that way. The feature worked with my Nexus 7 tablet, allowing limited zoom and picture taking.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Manjit
Reviews.Content: Just abt the best at the selling price point! Just the most amazing camera ever that i've bought in my life!

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Chris.Inc2 "Grandmother of 2* Chris'Shani & C...
Reviews.Content: This camera has everything I was looking for in one device, it is so hard to find a great camera that offers Wi-Fi network built in, it connects to my phone, pc and printer. I would definitely recommend this camera from Amazon. because it is in other stores at a greater price. my camera came before date it was promised. I just love it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I can't believe the zoom on this camera. We bought this for my cousin, she used it to take many wonderful photos that rivaled my DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with Great Features
Reviews.Author: Jamie P.
Reviews.Content: I had my eye on this camera for a little while and decided to buy it with some Amazon gift cards I got for Christmas.  I thought about getting the Galaxy camera but decided to take a chance on this one and I am glad I did.  My favorite feature is being able to connect this wirelessly to my Samsung Galaxy S3 and download the pictures to my phone.  I love this camera and would recommend it to anyone who loves to share and edit pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Boriqua Baby
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my trip.  Not as easy to use as I thought, thats why I gave it four stars.  But the price could not be beat and is compact enough for my travels.  Also received item as indicated by supplier

Reviews.Title: Zoom doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: The zoom on my camera won't adjust, or retract...just zooms out fully and won't focus.  It then freezes and I have to turn off the camera to continue.  I don't have time to return it before a trip to New Zealand, so I guess I'll have to carry my old camera also in case anything else goes wrong with this one.  Not happy!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Cumby "jeannesbooks"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera before I depart to study in Korea (Samsung! wootwoot!) I've always been Samsung biased and this camera exceeds my already high expectations!I mean, it connects to the internet!! I have had so much fun uploading pictures directly from the camera (probably been having too much fun).The camera has really cool editing tools and awesome effects. It's compact and can it in my pocket ( it does bulg a little considering it has a huge lens or zooming)the picture are o perfect quality too.I'm very excited to start putting it to good use in Korea, I'm sure it's going to become a handy little tool!!!Definitely has my highest recommendation.

Reviews.Title: This camera is getting a lot of use.
Reviews.Author: Claudia Getz
Reviews.Content: I needed a good camera that was small enough to pack around so I don't miss any "kodak moments" with my family.  This camera has been so easy to use. It's intuitive. I did study the owners manual. But only once and haven't had to go back to it. I can figure everything out. I have never been disappointed. Love being able to use the iPhone for the cable release. Love being able to e-mail my photos to friends and to my computer. I can even e-mail straight to facebook.  Now my pictures actually get seen instead of just sitting idle in a memory card. Love the girly white color too.

Reviews.Title: Very, very good buy.
Reviews.Author: bisdak
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this camera.  So easy to use and make very good pictures.  Samsung digital cameras will surely be the camera of the future.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: saga62
Reviews.Content: This is an expensive camera that is easy to use and takes fabulous pictures.  I highly recommend it for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Vermont Runaway
Reviews.Content: awesome camera.  does all it says it will and then some.  great for traveling as it is small enough to fit in pocket.  fantastic  telephoto lens-. takes nice sharp images.  would recommend this camera for all to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Karen Fry
Reviews.Content: We like the new camera, nice to take a picture and put it right on FaceBook! Thanks John and Karen

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Croney
Reviews.Content: Very good product! Great zoom and I like the sharing option! Would recommend for anyone wanting a good point and shoot!

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Crawford "I am from the Central Valley in ...
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a present for my granddaughter.  She loves it!  The picture quality is great, it is small enough to carry conveniently, and she loves the wi-fi capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: SunDown
Reviews.Content: Good quality pictures, easy to use, great to send pictures to friend thru the Wi-Fi.  Excellent for the photo enthusiast!

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mommarj"
Reviews.Content: My daughter is loving her new camera.  It takes a great photo and is quite versatile.  I like how it can interact with my Samsung Droid.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Cavalry "Mark"
Reviews.Content: I like the was you can use certain Samsung phones as the camera's remote control. you can zoom with them and take a picture. The camera is nice and compact for a pocket. The WiFi feature that is used to transfer the pictures directly to facebook etc is really cool.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB150F
Reviews.Author: Mabel Aviles
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to update my old one and on a friend's recommendation. Could not be happier! Awesome camera. Very happy with my pictures and features.

Reviews.Title: buyer be where!
Reviews.Author: katie
Reviews.Content: let me first say this is a really good camera.. you can upload pictures to Facebook or e-mailbut you can not link it to your phone unless you have a Samsung galaxy phone i called them cause i could not get itto link to my phone and it will not link to a tablet so thats crap they say you can i have a Samsung galaxy tab 10.1an they told me it wont link to that ether so unless you have the  Samsung galaxy phone your out of luck linking anything too the camera but it did it hooked to my WiFi just fine... i love the camera for the Facebook an the quality of the camera over all is really nice but i only paid 129$ for mine. i would not pay 229$ ( witch Samsung is asking online for it) its not worth that much..

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera...  Bought for our daughter
Reviews.Author: Gran
Reviews.Content: Bought for daughter who does alot on Facebook.  She loved the compatability with it.  Great buy!  Amazing capabilities...  Exactly what she wanted.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Ray Schultz
Reviews.Content: Found the pictures don't seem to be high quality and the camera feels cheap and plasticy.  I wouldn't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love It <3
Reviews.Author: Karina E. Diego
Reviews.Content: im enjoying this product it was a prefect gift to receive......... It takes good pics n has awesome apps..... <3

Reviews.Title: Cool features... Not so cool photos
Reviews.Author: Anna9882
Reviews.Content: My biggest complaint with this camera was the photo quality. I could never seem to get the coloring right. When I took pictures on Auto everyone's faces were completely washed out and every feature I tried I couldn't seem to fix that problem.

Reviews.Title: Nice and compact.
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Pyles "GON-UP-RU"
Reviews.Content: A good little camera. We take it on all our hikes which are many.. The video is good. In low light it is a little grainy. Price is right.

Reviews.Title: It's very good
Reviews.Author: Vishal
Reviews.Content: It's a good product with all the features for which a common man can want to use it. I can say it's awesome

Reviews.Title: great carmera
Reviews.Author: floyd
Reviews.Content: gave the camera as a gift and she loved it.  all the special effects.  great camera at a great price

Reviews.Title: Better tan expected
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: I expected something not as sturdily built, and the white looks "cool"Pictures are great, and the WiFi found my Samsung SmartTV so everyone in the room can see my shots.I waiting to see how good the battery life is, but it was used all day on Christmas and the day after and it still as plenty of charge.

Reviews.Title: Love my samsung, smart camera
Reviews.Author: June Lawson
Reviews.Content: I use this a lot. It is amazing cause I can send pics straight from the camera to any email, facebook, twitter, etc. Very nice.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Nodi
Reviews.Content: it is very useful and good to use any where. it has WiFi so you can connect to internet and facebook to upload any images immeidatly.

Reviews.Title: Photo counter went bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good camera, really like it. Had the camera for a week. The photo counter started out as 100-0001. Took five photos and the counter jumped up to 100-2886.The next photo was 100-2887 and so forth. Talked to Samsung and they had no solution to fix the counter. Amazon is giving me a full refund on the camera. Will probably purchase the same model when I get my refund from Amazon. Might have been just a burp in the counter. The WiFi part of the camera is really nice.

Reviews.Title: samsung_wb150f camera
Reviews.Author: Sam Oht
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera,love the 18x zoom and all the extras. Great bang for your buck! Highly recommend this camera. Love the Wi-Fi feature. A lot of detail in this camera.

Reviews.Title: MAC USERS BEWARE!!!  Wifi will not work for you...
Reviews.Author: H. Kirk
Reviews.Content: MAC USERS BEWARE!!!  Although Samsung's website description for this camera gives you system requirements for a Mac, their software does not work on Macs (which they don't tell you anywhere).  So you cannot use the wifi uploading feature to wirelessly upload your photos to your computer.  Trying to even get the camera connected to any wifi is a task in itself.  I did finally get a photo to email off of the camera, but it emails the photos through a Samsung email network, so it went into my Spam folder when I received it on my computer.  This makes sending photos to others difficult since it goes into their Spam folders.Also, Samsung's Remote Viewfinder App that they have for the iPhone does not work at all.  Even after it updated the App 4 or 5 times in only 4 weeks time, it never worked. I called and spent more than an hour on the phone with their techie who swore up and down that Samsung does not mention system requirements for Mac on their website and that they absolutely do not make an app for the iPhone and never would.  When I proved her wrong by having her go to their own website and by having her open iTunes and see the App that says it is made by Samsung and says that it is supposed to work for this camera model, she said that she couldn't help me because although they have apps for other phones, they only guarantee their Samsung-based phone app to work.I admit that I got pretty decent quality pictures from the camera (although not in low light).  The 18x zoom is also great on such a compact camera.  So I gave it a 2 star rating instead of 1.  But if you are a Mac / iPhone user and are purchasing the phone for the wifi capabilities, forget it.I will say that no matter why you are purchasing it, EVEN IF YOU ARE A PC USER, expect that if you have a problem with or question about the camera, you will likely know more than their techies do (no offense, but they were clueless about what Samsung even offered or stated... let alone about being able to give any actual help or answers).  I actually returned the camera just before the 30 day mark since none of the wifi features worked and the low light photos were not good.A wifi camera is a great concept... if only it worked.

Reviews.Title: Falls Short in One IMPORTANT Area
Reviews.Author: M. Collins
Reviews.Content: I was excited to buy this camera after reading all about its features. However, while reading reviews from others (especially the professional reviewer sites) I kept reading about poor picture quality. After a while I thought, "Darn it. Just go out and buy one and find out for yourself." So I did ... and guess what? ... those reviewers were correct. The photo quality of the images is poor at best. I've already got a Samsung SIII mobile and I think it actually takes better photos than this device.I returned it to Best Buy after 3 days.The features are cool (I liked the wifi to phone thing), but it just falls way too short in the image quality category. There is no way I can give this camera any more than two stars.Keep trying, Samsung. You'll get there someday.

Reviews.Title: Slow downloading
Reviews.Author: J. Yang
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera hoping to save some time getting photos downloaded off the camera. Did not work well. If you are planning on using the WiFi link to download all your shots, it will take a long time and sometimes fail during the process. Much easier to take out the SD card and plug it into your computer card reader. The occasional posting to a social website is probably the limit for WiFi functionality. Pic quality are only OK. I would not recommend

Reviews.Title: Lens Cover Jams AGAIN!
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I purchased this camera this year. Used it on one trip to Idaho and teh lens cover is jamming already. It is flimsy and the smallest speck of dust will jam it. Don't buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: Great  camera, takes great picture and has and awesome zoom. The wifi feature is really good but the only down fall of this feature is that the camera doesnt have a touch screen to lable the pics and folders. You have to use the arrow keys and ok buttons to enter text which is tedious and almost makes you not want to use the feature (this is why I bought the camera. the only other minor down fall is it doesnt have the panoramic mode like the iphone or some other cameras on the market. These are the only two complaints I have but all in all this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket shooter, but not if you have a DSLR or top-shelf phone
Reviews.Author: Dr Moreau
Reviews.Content: What can I say? Tons of features and will take lots of nice and easy snaps while on vacation, but for someone like me who already owns lots of nice camera equipment it just wasn't worth it. I was always the one that said "at least it's better than a camera phone". I upgraded my phone about a week after buying it and compared the two...and the phone (Galaxy S3) actually had a much sharper picture.Oh well, you learn something every day.

Reviews.Title: Unimpressed.
Reviews.Author: michael d collier
Reviews.Content: First of all, the build quality is disappointing. The plastic construction feels cheap. But, that's not what I bought it. Was itching to tinker with the WiFi features. The interface is awkward and not at all intuitive. Finally, as noted in other reviews, low light pictures are of poor quality.I think you'd be much better off to buy a Canon with an Eye-Fi card. Much more flexible and much better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Could have been better...
Reviews.Author: Justin Vickers
Reviews.Content: The camera had great features but the picture quality is not that great compared to other cameras that I've had.

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE!
Reviews.Author: evo4
Reviews.Content: I'm soooo in love with this camera!!! Awesome point and shoot camera with many easy to use feature. The wifi is wonderful. The battery life is also AWESOME!! Shutter speed is very fast.I have brought several point and shot camera in the last year since my other camera died and have returned them all.Very very very very happy customer!!!

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: yuval cohen
Reviews.Content: it is heavy, thick and inefficient. the telescope was not going out for few times and the are knocking noises from it

Reviews.Title: Amazing power in a small camera
Reviews.Author: Angel Lee
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful.  I paid just over $100 for it and am completely impressed with not only the features and options but the fabulous photo quality.  Even at maximum zoom the photos are clear and stunning.  I love the option of wi-fi so I can upload immediately to Facebook or Picasa or Photobucket, etc.  I highly recommend this camera.  I'm going to see if there's a way for me to post photos I've taken!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: TjP
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a picky 13-year-old amateur photographer. He's been using it since Christmas and playing with all the different settings and pronounced it "awesome." In addition, the wi-fi transfer is extremely handy.

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Jamiev
Reviews.Content: Beautiful camera and good for sending pics to your phone. Not sure about the quality of the picture though. I don't know why mine is so blurry. I mean if it was taken when place on a solid ground, the picture will turns out just fine. Yet when I hold the camera and took a picture, it turned out quite blurry. I don't think my hand is shaky too, I had no problem using other camera. Did I get a faulty one? Maybe.

Reviews.Title: Love the WIFI and the Apps
Reviews.Author: piamomia
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung products, so when it was time for me to get and upgrade a camera I'm so glad I bumped into this. The previous comments on here really helped me a lot to purchase this product and I'm totally happy with the purchase. Just the price alone is unbeatable and w/ 14MP and 18x Optical Zoom, this is exactly what I need for my travels next year! The WIFI will help tremendously, my photos will automatically sync to my PC so I can delete files on the SD Card on the go if needed to create more memory :)

Reviews.Title: Poor, unclear images.
Reviews.Author: Beccabell11
Reviews.Content: I honestly thought i would love this camera. It takes terrible low light images, and EVERY shot no matter the setting is not crisp. I returned it within 3 days and after 321 crappy images.

Reviews.Title: Image quality leaves much to be desired
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Image quality leaves much to be desired. Features and specs look good on paper, but in reality this is a nice toy to play around, but not to preserve your memories.

Reviews.Title: Cámara completa
Reviews.Author: Dario Javier Zhingri Muesmoran
Reviews.Content: Tiene todo lo que deseas tener en una cámara compacta, es super buena, ligera, moderna y la calidad de fotos y vídeos excelente.

Reviews.Title: Wireless connectivity issues.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Although this camera got decent revues, we had nothing but problems trying to connect to wireless networks. I tried two different networks and it never did connect, kept having error messages. i contacted Samsung support but they were baffled. The ONLY reason to get this camera, IMO, is for the wireless capability. Without that there is nothing special about it at all, and you can probably get a better camera for less money.

Reviews.Title: Smart Camera with connectivity.
Reviews.Author: Robert Laybourn
Reviews.Content: This small camera says it does a lot. It has quite a bit of zoom and it connects with my smartphone and Wi/Fi to my PC. I have taken it out into the field in Wyoming and came back with  good images from my deer, pronghorn and elk hunts. But I have found that although it has Programmed settings for photos of sunsets and sunrises it will not take an acceptably focused image of them. There may be other weaknesses I will discover as I continue to use it. I find that it's not so easy to share those images. The Mobile Link with my Samsung Galaxy is problematic and without that link it's not possible to add the GPS information to the photo. I'm dissatisfied.

Reviews.Title: I took a shot at it..
Reviews.Author: Nathan Ziegenfuss "bluemtgrass"
Reviews.Content: Its better than most of the reviewers indicate. Takes nice video to boot as well as decent sound. With the discount I paid less than $ 50 over a year ago. Well worth that price.

Reviews.Title: COULDN'T GET IT TOWORK
Reviews.Author: SPORKY
Reviews.Content: TOO COMPLICATED AND UNWILLING TO SPEND MORE TIME WITH TECHIES TO FIGURE IT OUT, AND THIS DOESN'T HELP ANY AT ALL.

Reviews.Title: Would have been 5 stars if . . . . .
Reviews.Author: J. Carullo "JohnC"
Reviews.Content: The Wi-Fi backup to a PC was a problem. We had two cameras identifying with different PCs in the office. Wi-Fi backup using camera "B" activated the software installed on camera "A". So, it was back to wires for offloading pictures.Other than that the camera is excellent with outstanding picture quality and ease of use. Had the Wi-Fi worked as described, this would have been 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kela
Reviews.Content: I love this camera I love the smart button that chooses which scene for you so you don't have to pick low light and bright I also like the airless feature that lets you load to your phone or tablet this is my first camera and years I love that it have a speaker on it for when you play back videos. There also is a neat application that lets you remote in with your phone I set the camera up on my coworkers desk and took a picture of her scarfing down some doritos very funny for me I have been using that a lot to take picutres with my kids with asking someone to hold the camera

Reviews.Title: If I can take great pics with this, anyone can
Reviews.Author: krys4kismet
Reviews.Content: I love this camera,  Its very user friendly.  The colors are bright and crisp.  People have asked me about the camera because the pictures look so good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Mourier "Mamzelle"
Reviews.Content: This is a great lightweight digital camera. The pictures are crisp and clean and the functions of the camera are great. Quite a value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Shippy
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to use. Takes excellent pic. Very happy with it. Just wish it has touch screen for entering info when uploading pics to facebook etc.

Reviews.Title: comentario
Reviews.Author: elizabeth colina
Reviews.Content: excellent, the whole process sure recommend it. The order was carried out on time is 100% safe and very good article

Reviews.Title: samsung WB150F
Reviews.Author: María Cecilia siutto
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the machine. It has been used quite hasdta now without errors. Time will be the best judge

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB150F
Reviews.Author: Edward R.
Reviews.Content: At first I felt like returning the camera, because the sharpness of the pics was very disappointing. But, after an afternoon of taking different style pics, with various modes, found out what works best. (For sharper photos, it does make a diff, if you set the wheel on "P" program, and look in the menu for "image adjust", you will then be able to adjust the saturation/sharpness/contrast.)Once you figure out all the functions, it's a great camera.Also, It's not always easy to find a camera that works well with low light, this one is the exception. The flash is set on "off" because it does so well without the flash.We haven't taken much videos, but so far, we're pleased.  The image. the focus and sound, are good,The size is very practical, it's well built, and the wi-fi option is a nice bonus. We do recommend.

Reviews.Title: My new Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Ahrenholtz
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my camera, however the box that it arrived in was in terrible shape.  It was open, but thankfully the camera was still in it.

Reviews.Title: A dandy little camera
Reviews.Author: Seek
Reviews.Content: I once had a Cannon Power Shot digtal camera which is a good camera, but too much for my old brain to learn. So I gave it to my daughter.I purchased this Samsung WB150 because it is small, I can hide it in my hand and put it into my pocket. It has a little weight to it, i.e. not feather light. The features are the same as an expensive camera, video and many settings to learn, much the same as in the Canon Power Shot. This will serve my purpose in snapping pictures, close-up and some distance. And it will give satisfactory pictures, just as good as the Cannon I had. The User Manual is on the CD that comes with it. The price is right for all that can be done with this little jewel.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: A. David
Reviews.Content: Works great and has great features. Had a problem with Wi-Fi at a McDonald's but normally works fine. This a great starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: A.R.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this camera. For it's price range it is nice. I would recommend it to the average buyer.

Reviews.Title: Good Point & Shoot
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Good POINT AND SHOOT camera, but did not have the quality that I needed.  Gave it away as a gift to my grandson who it having a great time with it.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: luis eduardo martinez arias
Reviews.Content: excelente el wifi funciona maravillosamente tomas tus fotos y sube-las a la red de inmediato se lo recomiendo la entrega no tube ningun incoveniente

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Enid
Reviews.Content: I live surrounded by mountains, so I was goofing around when my camera arrived and went outside to test the zoom, and honestly, I've found houses I had never seen before in my life!!! Such a pretty camera, haven't test the wifi yet (I don't have that kind of internet where my house is) and is so tiny. I mean compared with my brothers camera (a big Cannon  camera of "God knows it's zoom range is, 'cause I don't remember" but I'm pretty sure is 20x ) is so easy to carry... Would defenitely recomend.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Marta
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera.  Just love it. I love the artistic shots and the zoom quality.  Another great thing is the wifi.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality.
Reviews.Author: Robert Haley
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have done more research on cameras.. I thought the smart camera would be fun but we don't use that feature at all on the camera.. and the picture quality for us and the shutter speed is lacking on this camera. If you are buying this camera for action shots or children that are on the move don't buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda R. Allaire
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my granddaughter who is 9...she just loves it so much I think I will have to get one just like it for me.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera!
Reviews.Author: Lauren Pogorel
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It takes really nice pictures and you are able to upload them right to your favorite social network site! There are also a lot of options on the camera for changing the colors and the scenes!! Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Takes good pictures, poor functionality* Update: After firmware update, much better!
Reviews.Author: Ohio
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically for the wireless features.  I wanted to cut the cord and be able to wirelessly upload images to my PC/iPad/laptop/iPhone/Facebook/Skydrive.  I ALWAYS get an error and. I am very tech-savy, I know how to troubleshoot.  I am very disappointed with Samsung for releasing such a crap product.The camera takes good pictures, I will give it that.  But I could have bought a camera that takes equivalent pictures for 1/2 the price.  I paid extra for the wireless functionality.I bought the camera and took it to Italy with me.  My wife discarded the box while I was away.  Had she not, I would have returned this.EDIT:  I installed the firmware update and all of the non working features now work.

Reviews.Title: Good overall camera with some drawbacks
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey J. Story "bikerider"
Reviews.Content: The 18-inch optical zoom is a plus for taking both photos and videos, especially under daylight conditions.  Photo quality is very good in daylight.  But in low-light conditions, the video is grainy and the flash is slow to recharge.  Also, the range of the flash is very limited.A nice feature is the shutter speed/ aperture priority function when you want to turn off the program mode.For a small camera, it takes very good photos and video in daylight conditions and I can recommend the camera for daylight use.

Reviews.Title: After a few uses, it does not connect to Facebook and Samsung did not respond my inquiry about it
Reviews.Author: Adalberto Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This camera is really good, I am happy with my purchase, but after a few uses, it does not connect to Facebook to post my pictures wirelessly.  It all started after I installed the camera software in my computer.  I sent the question to Samsung last week and they still have not come back to me with a solution to the problem, it is a pity since the camera is nice, picture resolution is acceptable for the price I paid and the wireless feature saves you time.  So I am not changing the qualification until Samsung gives proper feedback.

Reviews.Title: An excellent camera features BUT...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "gatorlandkali"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a point & shoot camera that is inexpensive and I found this. I'm about to put up a 5-star on the product but one thing that catches my attention while using. When the camera is in idle [power on], I hear clicks inside. I tried to listen closely because it might be the motor lens moving but I'm surprised because the unit is actually making sounds while in an idle stage. Sometimes there are few units that got out from the crack with minor problems and I guess this is one of them. I don't have problems with photos, the features, the zooms, the settings, the wifi and other neat features when taking photos because those are an excellent stuff but when a camera starts making sounds, that's an indication the camera will not last long. If you have no issues with the sound clicks, then this is the unit you can muster, carry, use and an extra weapon for your photography hobby.

Reviews.Title: Decent for certain situations.
Reviews.Author: C. Daniels
Reviews.Content: Over all this camera has some great features although I think the features took precident over sharp image quality. That is not to say it doesn't take razor sharp images in many cases but unless the light is right your odds of capturing that legendary image are not good. I have played around with the various modes and find I am happier with the results on the less automatic settings where some variables are manual. The "smart auto" is really useless in all but perfect conditions. Over all. I would be reluctant to buy a samsung camera again. I would definately not buy this model unless it was below $100. For around $89 it would get another star but for $135 it is a three star camera in ideal conditions.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but................
Reviews.Author: H. Thomas "MzPrttyBrwnEyez "I love to cre...
Reviews.Content: HORRIBLE battery life. I don't know if I'm doing something wrong or what but no battery should die without the item being on!!!  Not understanding that one bit.  I do love the photos and especially the 18x optical zoom.  Other than the battery, I LOVE this camera!

Reviews.Title: Broke after only 1 week...
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: It was great when I first got it, but I only got to use it for a little over a week.. I took my camera home for winter break and I realized the screen was black, but I thought it was because maybe it was low on battery but the screen was still black. I looked up somewhere to take out the memory card and fully charge it to see if maybe something was wrong with the memory card, but after charging it didn't turn on AT ALL!!! I kept trying to turn it on but it wouldn't and because I'm on winter break for 3 weeks I couldn't send it back so I just completely wasted my money... -____-

Reviews.Title: Pathetic picture quality
Reviews.Author: Grant101
Reviews.Content: Was excited as it promised good zoom, the zoom is good, but quality of pictures is worse than my old Canon A510 which is 8 years old, and especially when is relatively poor lighting conditions - had it back at Samsung for a check up in the hope of solving the issues, but am totally disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Henry
Reviews.Content: Camera does everything that I wanted (besides basic good camera function (zoom, quality, etc), I was interested in a camera withWiFi, for a very reasonable price.Discovered added benefits after I received the camera - pretty cool editing, filters, etc.I used to be a pretty big camera buff but haven't been much interested in recent years - it's possible that this camera will renew my interest.Love the camera.

Reviews.Title: Don't think I got what I ordered
Reviews.Author: DGR
Reviews.Content: I do not believe the product was new, as the seal on the box had been broken, the battery was unwrapped and the viewer appeared to have small scratches.  Thought I was buying new!

Reviews.Title: Good Photos but Flawed Wifi
Reviews.Author: M. Staley "Max"
Reviews.Content: Had this camera since the 19th of Nov 2012. Not had a great time with it so far! One of the main reasons for buying this camera was the Wi-Fi functions, especially the SkyDrive upload option. On taking it out of the box I took a range of test photos and set about trying out this feature. I put in my SkyDrive account details and connected to my home Wi-Fi, but when I hit submit on the SkyDrive account details i got the message "error: document to large". I tried a few times, no change. So went to Samsung's site and found there was a firmware update for it. I followed the instructions and 10mins later I had a bricked, unusable camera.To Samsung's credit they sent through a return box pretty quickly and got the camera back to me in about 7 working days (sadly I think it was a refurb, so probably older than the new one i had bought). I tried all of the above again, still couldn't log in to SkyDrive, so crossed my fingers and did the firmware update. This time it worked and so tried SkyDrive yet again! Still the same error message.So to conclude, although the camera takes good photos and the zoom, although slow, is very good. The extra features that persuaded me to buy this over other cameras of a similar price just do not work as advertised. (actually the Facebook upload does look to work, but i don't use this for backup of photos)I am current again in contact with Samsung to try and get support with this feature, I would be interested to hear if anyone else has had the same issue.

Reviews.Title: Wi Fi PC Auto Backup difficult to use
Reviews.Author: Shari Bond
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great features, but more power to you if you can get the PC Auto Backup WiFi feature to work. Also viewing pix via TV Link is painfully slow when advancing the pix. Your better off just using the USB cable. The social sharing option was fairly easy, have not yet tried to email, but I heard that was easy.Also some pix using the Smart setting come out blurry, not sure why.Love the size of this camera, not so tiny like so many are now but not so large that it is too heavy or cumbersome.Love the different scene settings, the video button, the fun frames and such. Pix and vids come out very nice. Definately recommend this camera but don't buy it just because of the WiFi feature. Unless improved this is just a gimmick so far.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY...Waste of time...
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Macala "Eclectic"
Reviews.Content: Got the camera as a Christmas present, loved the surprise gift...Great picture taking camera with quick connections at  Starbucks for both email and FB, but the well, other wifi places, not so much luck.... I will keep trying. I just had it for one day...So I'm still working out the kinks...will update later this week...First day grade...3 Stars...Next day update...after trying three times this morning to load image to send...lost connection at Starbucks....3 times...Why Samsung would put this on the market is a mystery...There are just too many bugs and the internet sharing ideas are just too cumbersome....this is the 21st Century...not 1990...when the computer world was relatively young....DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA...lots of time wasted...

Reviews.Title: Probably the worst camera I have owned, including super cheap ones
Reviews.Author: Kristopher Petersen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after having owned a very good Samsung camera a couple years before. That camera took very consistently high-quality pictures and was otherwise very consistent. Unfortunately, it was stolen... The camera after that for me was extremely cheap (I think I paid about $80 for it), and was lost. That one had OK performance at low light, but was completely worthless in nighttime conditions.After that one disappeared, I was in a situation where I was in a developing country that didn't have many options, and the options were all significantly overpriced and not well-reviewed. I'd seen some reviews on this camera that were a little bit troubling, but the vast majority were so incredibly positive that, given a lack of other decent options, I'd give this one a shot.It worked OK at first, but the pictures NEVER were really that clear. Seriously, if I go through a series of these pictures in full screen mode on a laptop screen, not even zoomed in, it will give me a headache if I do so for longer than five minutes. I'm not even talking about full resolution here, just fitting it in the screen. The panorama mode (one thing that was consistently awesome on my previous Samsung) is just flat-out awful - take the fuzziness and multiply it by about 50.I've seen other reviews on here suggesting to use some software to touch up the blurriness of the photos - if you have to do that, it's a terrible camera.Now, I'm a very patient person and don't want to throw away a ton of money (I can't take it back to the store because too much time passed before I realized that it was the camera, and not me, that's the problem), so I have tolerated it for a while. But now is where it crosses the line.... it CONSTANTLY freezes. I looked up on the support website, figuring there'd be some kind of firmware update or something addressing this problem. Nope. Samsung says it's a memory card problem, or that it's defective. The same memory card I've used on this works flawlessly in every single other device I own that has a card slot. And there seem to be a ton of other people out there with the freezing problem, so if mine's defective, it looks like a rather huge proportion of the rest of these are defective. I've found a way to MacGyver its controls to make it work (which takes about two minutes every time I start it up, and therefore is unsustainable for long-term use), but this thing is so awful that the only reason I didn't just smash it on the sidewalk in Quito is because littering is bad.In sum: This thing is garbage; do yourself a favor and get something else.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: SnC
Reviews.Content: Nice camera. Love the modern look, it's wifi feature, which is a great feature, and when pictures are taken in an optimum setting, they are beautiful. However, at times, the pictures will come out blurry. I will have to take a shot multiple times. I'm not tech savy to change certain settings to get a clear pic, so that becomes annoying.

Reviews.Title: Lots of features , mobile quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: photobucket upload is cool, it takes about 10 secs for the menu to load up thought when switching to that mode.pc backup is cool although it's not automatic, you must trigger it.iphone viewfinder is cool, (not the phone fault but you need to reconnect on you phone to a special camera wifi network)picture quality, this takes cell phone quality pictures. Albiet cellphones take great pictures today.15 minutes of video maxexcellent batterylife and small formfactor.

Reviews.Title: QUIT WORKING AFTER ONLY A FEW DAYS AND SELLER DIDN'T STAND BEHIND IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Novak
Reviews.Content: I TOOK THIS ON VACATION, TOOK A HANDFUL OF PHOTOS AND THE SHUTTER QUIT OPENING. SELLER SENT ME A RETURN LABEL; I RETURNED IT; BUT NO CREDIT WAS MADE TO MY ACCOUNT. FOLLOWED UP AGAIN WITH SELLER AND THEY SAID THEY DIDN'T TAKE RETURNS AFTER 30 DAYS. THEY DID NOT SEND ME THE CAMERA BACK...SO I COULD AT LEAST GET IT FIXED. THEY JUST TOOK MY MONEY AND KEPT THE CAMERA - WHICH WAS THE WORST CAMERA I HAVE EVER OWNED. I DONT' THINK I EVEN WENT THROUGH THREE BATTERY CYCLES.

Reviews.Title: I'm still shopping & have a question rather than a review. Please help.
Reviews.Author: Shoppingthemarket
Reviews.Content: I am currently shopping the market for a point & shoot digital camera to replace my Samsung L200 that recently ate dirt. Literally. It was dropped from short distance onto the beach and now the shutter will not open or close. It tries. But can't do it. Anyway, its time for a new one. I really like a lot of the reviews & features of this Samsung camera. One of my greatest concerns is the quality of indoor photos. With a 21 month old, a majority of my pictures are taken inside. My husband has a Kodak and it takes beautiful outside pictures but HORRIBLE inside photos - no matter what he does with the settings. Anyway, can anyone & everyone provide me with some feedback as to the quality of your indoor photos?? Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: If I could only upload the photos to my computer
Reviews.Author: Nancy Kamm
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so I could EASILY upload photos to my computer and Facebook.  I used it over the Thanksgiving holidays and it worked great.  Then I came home and the cable that came with the camera didn't fit the camera, so I purchased another cable specifically for this camera, received it today and SURPRISE it doesn't fit the camera either.  So I tried to upload the photos through the WIFI option and haven't been able to get that to work either.  I'm paying a techie to come to see if he can figure this out.  I'm very frustrated with this camera.  I've only had it a month; but am about ready to trade it back to Amazon for something else that works.  My advice - don't bother.

Reviews.Title: Seemed Good but I'm Returning due to Lousy Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera seemed decent, but I've had bad experiences lately with Samsung removing important features from their products during updates leaving the products no longer usable for many purposes.  When I tried to contact Samsung to ask for help to solve the problems caused by the updates, I kept getting the run around by being directed to department after department where people said they "didn't deal with questions related to product updates".
