Anyway, I'm returning the camera, because I can't afford to have a camera become unusable at some point and not have any customer service that is willing to help.

Reviews.Title: Had To Return
Reviews.Author: HuntersPad
Reviews.Content: Had to return it. Worse Quality Than my Galaxy Note II 8mp camera even the video was not that great pictures turned out worse than a OLD android phone I have laying around

Reviews.Title: This camera DOES NOT HAVE A TOUCH SCREEN..!!!
Reviews.Author: roaeja "Hey you!"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and saw mention of a touch screen!  Thisperson must have been smoking bad weed or something.IT DOES NOT HAVE A TOUCH SCREEN!!  PERIOD!!I took his word, only to find out later it doesn't have one.  Da on me.Display Type 3.0-inch 460K dots TFT LCDThe Allshare Play on my Samsung UN55ES8000 tv now.  Have no clue why it refused to play before?  Strange.  This camera is loaded with more features, than you will ever use.If you are having trouble getting Allshare Play going on your Samsungtv, try reconfiguring your wireless router.  First hook up a DSL cablefrom your computer to the router.  In your browser, type in 192.168.1.1and passwords for router.  Usually Admin, Admin.  The go to wirelessconfiguration.  Set to 'Mixed' and auto for bottom three. I had mine set for 20mhz narrow band, Auto sets it what thedevice need, like 40mhz broadband.  It gives you a more stablewifi path for things to talk to each other on. If you send a picture to your Samsung tv, it will get there if you goto Allshare Play photos and look for camera, but the cameracontinues to send, it won't stop sending! On the earlier version Sh100, it works flawlessly.  You take a picture,select it, go to Allshare, select tv UN55ES8000 and the picture comesup on the screen, the whole screen.  You don't even have to screwaround, going to Allshae!  It's there, front and center. But, with his camera, you have to hunt and peck, and it won't time out.More feature, but a greater pain in the butt to use. I would recommend sticking or buying the Samsung EC-SH100 Wi-FiDigital Camera with 14 MP, 5x Optical Zoom and Touchscreen. it ishalt the weight, half the price and far easier to use and it WORKS!If Samsung made this like the SH-100 with a touch screen; etc, they wouldhave another hit on their hand's.  But, they went click, click, click...

Reviews.Title: Too Big
Reviews.Author: Rob "rob4341"
Reviews.Content: The camera is just to big for the type.  I should I opted for less optical zoom which would have resulted in a smaller camera.

Reviews.Title: just got it, it's so cool and takes super sharp pictures...the camera of the future. I love it !!!!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Scruggs
Reviews.Content: this camera is fantastic does so so many wonderful lovely things. Great pictures fun to play around with. I just need a pouch to carry it..

Reviews.Title: Unreliable Product
Reviews.Author: CS
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera twice.1)When I uploaded the pics from use #1 to Facebook they had lines through the faces, terrible quality. Returned it.2)Camera just stopped working and now I have to go through the manufacturer.Do not purchase, it promises a lot but is a waste of time.

Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi is a joke
Reviews.Author: Alyssa A Clements
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the specific purpose of connecting it seamlessly with my iPhone app, that I actually downloaded before the camera even came in. One, the Samsung Viewfinder app does not work from the WB150F to my iPhone, at all, period. The Samsung MobileLink app worked a whopping total of one time. So disappointed. Also, you cannot upload to your Mac without a wire. In essence, unless I want to slowly upload a picture to facebook, the wi-fi feature is absolutely useless. Thanks Samsung! Will be returning if no one can get the apps to work within a week or two.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy and do not use-Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: unhappy person
Reviews.Content: I have given one star because ther isn't an option for 0. I don't want people to listen to those reviews about this camera being good and I don't want people to fall for them and waste their money. Ignore them reviews because they're false and incorrect. It is not a good camera and takes the worst pictures ever. I unfortunately fell for buying this camera looking to upgrade from my 6 megapixel, thinking I could take SLR type pictures, well I was wrong. The image quality is so mediocre and not very good at all. Don't think the WIFI is any good either. Just a rubbish camera. DO NOT FALL FOR THE FAKE REVIEWS. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA AND I ADVISE YOU THE IMAGE QUALITY IS THAT OF A NOKIA PHONE CAMERA

Reviews.Title: What a joke
Reviews.Author: Nestor Rocha
Reviews.Content: The camera speaks of all kinds of great things it can do but they say nothing of the fact that It does not have wireless compatibility with Iphone, With Iphone - the most popular Smart phone out there!!.  Is only when you bought it and it doesn't work that you realize you've been stiffed.  The techs don't seem to know much so they are no help at all.  Also the software that comes with the camera is also not working with my PC which runs on Windows 7, it crashes even before it has loaded fully.

Reviews.Title: IT WILL DIE!!
Reviews.Author: I_got_it_at_AMAZON
Reviews.Content: This camera is currently on groupon for 149 bucks with free shipping. (Source: [...]). So, as usual I decided to get a feel of it at nearby stores. I went to about three stores that had the camera on sale for 159 dollars. I asked the sales rep to turn the camera on for me so I could try it out. All three stores had the camera on display and were broken to the point that it just wouldn't start up at all. Is that a coincidence or is that a pattern that shows how unreliable these cameras are. I would not buy it! I would not recommend it to others! If you like the camera Don't let my review stop you from buying it.  didn't like it and couldn't trust it enough to buy it. So, I am a proud non-owner of this camera!Pro: WIFI, Zoom and if you use android the power adapters are similar and fits inCons: IT WILL DIE!!
